Rulings.Tengu:
●The effect of “Patroid” targets a card.
●If “Patroid” is flipped face-down or removed from the field, its effect is reset and you can use it again that turn if you can get it face-up on the field again.
Rulings.Goat:
●The effect of “Patroid” targets a card.
●If “Patroid” is Set or removed from the field, its effect is reset and you can use it again that turn if you can get it face-up on the field again.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Patroid" targets a card.\n2. If "Patroid" is flipped face-down or removed from the field, its effect is reset and you can use it again that turn if you can get it face-up on the field again.
